projects.title: Garage Demolition
projects.description1: Demolition of a detached garage including concrete slab removal and debris disposal.
projects.description2: The team ensured safe disconnection of utilities and fast site clearing within 2 days.

projects.title: Bank Vault Removal
projects.description1: Specialized structural removal of a reinforced bank vault within an occupied commercial building.
projects.description2: Heavy machinery and precision cutting tools were used to maintain safety during extraction.

projects.title: Complete House Demolition
projects.description1: Full demolition of a detached house including foundation removal and waste handling.
projects.description2: Work included permit coordination and safe deconstruction of load-bearing walls.

projects.title: Mezzaanine Removal
projects.description1: Demolition and removal work carried out per scope and safety protocols.
projects.description2: Project was completed efficiently, with waste sorted and hauled away.

projects.title: Elevator Removal
projects.description1: Deconstruction and safe removal of outdated elevator systems in a multi-story facility.
projects.description2: Work included hoistway demolition, control panel extraction, and environmental compliance.

projects.title: Bathroom Removal
projects.description1: Interior demolition of outdated bathroom units for a renovation project.
projects.description2: Removal included tiles, drywall, and plumbing fixtures with dust control.

projects.title: Excavation
projects.description1: Excavation services for a new basement and utility trenching.
projects.description2: Work was completed on schedule with all spoil material responsibly hauled offsite.

projects.title: Block and Concrete Partition
projects.description1: Removal of block and concrete partition walls within a commercial unit.
projects.description2: Clean demolition with minimal vibration to avoid disrupting neighboring units.

projects.title: Interior Demolition
projects.description1: Interior strip-out of walls, ceilings, and flooring for remodeling.
projects.description2: Project completed dust-free with proper disposal of debris and salvageable material.

projects.title: Interior Demolition
projects.description1: Interior strip-out of walls, ceilings, and flooring for remodeling.
projects.description2: Project completed dust-free with proper disposal of debris and salvageable material.

projects.title: Basement Gutt
projects.description1: Gutting of a finished basement to prepare for full renovation.
projects.description2: All walls, flooring, and ceiling finishes removed while preserving structure.

projects.title: Steps Removal
projects.description1: Demolition of concrete front steps as part of an exterior remodel.
projects.description2: Concrete was safely broken up and removed without disturbing nearby structures.
